Title: The Sino-Soviet Alliance for Friendship and Mutual Assistance promotes enduring world peace
Publisher: Dazhong meishu chubanshe (大众美术出版社) Shanghai
Notes: The framed picture of a dove is the 1949 lithograph by Pablo Picasso, used to illustrate the poster of the 1949 Paris Peace Congress (Congrès mondial des Partisans de la paix) and one of the most used images of the international peace movement in the 1950s.
